headline: Broadcom’s US$73b AI Backlog Puts Valuation And Risks In Focus
summary: Broadcom (NasdaqGS:AVGO) reports a record US$73b AI-related backlog tied to its custom accelerators and networking products. Hyperscalers, including Google, are increasing orders for Broadcom's custom AI chips, highlighting demand for tailored silicon. Anthropic becomes Broadcom's fourth custom chip customer, expanding the company's footprint across leading AI model providers. ARK Invest and other institutional investors have recently added to positions in Broadcom, citing the company's AI...
